source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Realistic Colored Pencil Drawing: Portrait Drawing Course

visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh

items.headline: Learn How to Draw Realistic Famous Face with Colored Pencil.  Portrait Drawing with Colored Pencil  is a Cool Art
objectives_summary: students learn how to draw a portrait of a celebrity which shows the importance of volume and coloring in painting.
learn painting dark and bronze skin as well as stubble and beard
learn how to draw accessories of Johnny Depp such as his necklace and headband

items.title: Drawing Skills & Exercises: Easily Improve Your Drawings

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Easy & Fun Exercises That Develop Fundamental Drawing Skills
objectives_summary: How to draw two-dimensional shapes.
How to turn flat shapes into three-dimensional shapes.
How to create volume with geometric shapes.

items.title: How to Draw a House  - The complete course by Eli Ofir
items.headline: You will learn how to draw a complete house portrait with all the right perspectives, shading, depth and beauty.
objectives_summary: The basics of perspective, feeling the perspective and using pens and pencils with my technique. You will draw a complete House Portrait by the end of the course.

items.title: Trees in Watercolours
items.headline: Go from a non-painter to a watercolourist with confidence with a little help from Bev!
objectives_summary: Create a beautiful "Birch trees" painting to be proud of!
Review of Colour Theory by creating a Colour Wheel, and playing with complementary colours.
The best way to understand the medium of watercolours is to experiment with a variety of techniques which make up a watercolour artist toolbox

items.title: Draw Wild Animals using Pastel Pencils Volume 1
items.headline: Learn Pastel Pencil Techniques and Create Stunning Wild Animal Painitngs
objectives_summary: Draw an Elephant, Lion and Kingfisher using Pastel Pencils
Use the Pastel Pencil Techniques learnt to draw other realistic Animal Paintings
Use the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones

items.title: Uncial Calligraphy Masterclass
items.headline: Traditional calligraphy using a parallel pen or a 4 mm broad nib
objectives_summary: Draw beautiful uncial letterforms. Address a splendid envelope to a friend.
Address a splendid envelope to a friend.

items.title: Get Knotted: Learn to tie 15 important knots

visible_instructors.name: Bruce
visible_instructors.job_title: Coach and Owner at the Entrepreneur Incubator
visible_instructors.title: Bruce Wade

items.headline: A simple and easy to follow guide on how to tie and use the most important knots in every day life.
objectives_summary: understand the different types of rope
understand the different categories of knots
Learn how to select the right knot for the job

items.title: Miniature Food with Polymer Clay for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Maha
visible_instructors.job_title: Polymer Clay Artist - Founder at Selsal
visible_instructors.title: Maha Atef

items.headline: Learn on how to make realistic and yummy mini food charms even if you've never used polymer clay before!
objectives_summary: You'll be able to make miniature food charms with polymer clay.
You'll learn some useful tips and tricks to make your miniatures look realistic and yummy.
If you're a beginner, you'll gain the basic knowledge about polymer clay first.

items.title: PAINT COLOR. History, codes explained, charts, mixing & tips

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Maybe all you need to know to make better buys, make your pictures warm or cool, create distance & mix better colors.
objectives_summary: Understand you colors and avoid color mixing disappointment.
Understand how to mix your colors.
Learn how to read the codes on a tube of paint.

items.title: Expressionism Abstract Art "Coffee & Tissues Stories"
items.headline: Abstract Art Techniques & Secret unusual things to use with Acrylic Paint
objectives_summary: Create your own painting in one lesson
Understanding Abstract Art
Where that art based on, famous Painters who start it, first Abstract Art movement

items.title: Paint a Cottage with Watercolor & Pastel after AR Quinton
items.headline: Learn How To Paint AR Quinton's Scenes with Watercolour then Enhance the Picture using Pastel Pencils.
objectives_summary: Have a completed a Painting of AR Quinton's Thatch Cottage pictures
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: Learn Flower Drawing : Step-By-Step , for Kids & Beginners
items.headline: No Drawing Experience Necessary. Learn How to Draw Flowers Step-by-Step with Me!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will have created 11 flower drawings for you to share with the world!
By the end of the course you will have created 9 piece of leaf drawings for you to share with the world!
Learn Flower and Leaf Drawing

items.title: How to Draw Cats with Pastel Pencils
items.headline: Learn to draw a Black Cat, Tabby Kitten, Siamese Cat and Long-haired Cat using Pastel Pencils. 4 Subjects in 1 Bundle!
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw a variety of Cats
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Background & Perspective

visible_instructors.name: MANABI
visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業
visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY

items.headline: Let's draw more attractive backgrounds by learning perspective! [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
You can draw backgrounds including natural objects, man-made ones and effects.

items.title: Molding and Casting for Sculptors : Level 1
items.headline: The Basics of Molding and Casting
objectives_summary: To learn how to sculpt better figures for reproduction.
To learn about the materials and supplies needed for molding and casting.
To construct one-part molds for both a flat-backed pendant and a small figure.

items.title: Painting in Gouache - a complete guide
items.headline: Discover the freedom and flexibility of painting and sketching in gouache!
objectives_summary: How to paint in gouache
A beginners course in gouache
